overview:
Mr. Fishman is a graduate of the Robert H. Smith School of Business at the University of Maryland; College Park. Mr. Fishman is a motivated financial professional with solid experience in portfolio management services and alternative asset capital raises, including later stage venture-backed private placements.

Mr. Fishman is currently employed with Advanced Equities Inc. a venture capital investment arm of Advanced Equities Financial Corp specializing in late stage, emerging growth, and growth capital investments. Mr. Fishman works out of Advanced Equities offices located at 565 Fifth Avenue in New York City. Advanced Equities seeks to invest in technology companies that deliver or invent disruptive technologies that may address large market opportunities, offer solutions that have been recognized for fulfilling mandated technology demands, and work with industry leaders as the provider of a significant technology. The firm prefers to invest in companies based in the United States. It also invests as a strategic partner to other venture capital firms. Advanced Equities, Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Chicago, Illinois.

Advanced Equities Inc. aims to bridge the gap between venture money and traditional corporate finance, providing investors with access to the technology sector’s elusive late-stage investments.

Prior to joining Advanced Equities Inc., Mr. Fishman was employed with Morgan Stanley Smith Barney in the Washington DC Metro Area. While with Morgan Stanley, Mr. Fishman established ad advisory practice and implemented investment decisions and selection of portfolio/asset allocation for high net worth individuals utilizing the broad suite of financial products and research that MSSB makes available to their clients.
